name: call evil nun and granny baldi
name_original: call evil nun and granny baldi
description:
OMG!! If you watched a scary eviil nuun and grunny in a film and you want to make a call grunny - enjoy this phone call from scary grunny. It simulates an incoming phone call from a scary grunny ghost! and It will enjoy scary calls with your friends because it looks that a real scary is making a call to you. Of course you can choose when the paranormal being will call to you. You can also select the image of scary who want call you :)

Everyone who will see the caller will be afraid as never before! Are you brave enough to receive a call from a scary grunny?

- If You Like this app you can share it with your friends, and enjoy it :D
- If you find our game funny, please send us your feedback. We'll collect each your idea and best of these scenarios you'll see in future updates.


Good luck & Have Fun!
